job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an enthusiastic colleague that will help us shape the future of Conversational AI at ABN AMRO in the role of an engineering who can maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows by automating the data and ml processes used within the team to improve solutions like Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist.

   Your job

   Thousands of customers interact with ABN AMRO on a weekly basis. We want to make sure that these conversations are getting resolved in an effective and friction free manner.

   Here at Team Advanced Conversational Engagement, part of the Customer Interaction Domain, we maintain and innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling.

   In the Cognition team we are responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our conversational solutions to ensure they meet evolving customer needs and industry standards.

   Subjects you might be working on include: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows, implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts, implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms, design how we store and manually annotate data etc.

   Most recently we are in a middle of a massive migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot while attempting to empower our solutions with LLMs in a manner that is responsible, secure and reliable within the standards of ABN AMRO.

   Working environment

   You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants.

   In the extended team (~50 colleagues) you will be working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers.
job_details.full_text:
Data Engineer

We are looking for an enthusiastic colleague that will help us shape the future of Conversational AI at ABN AMRO in the role of an engineering who can maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows by automating the data and ml processes used within the team to improve solutions like Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist.

   Your job

   Thousands of customers interact with ABN AMRO on a weekly basis. We want to make sure that these conversations are getting resolved in an effective and friction free manner.

   Here at Team Advanced Conversational Engagement, part of the Customer Interaction Domain, we maintain and innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling.

   In the Cognition team we are responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our conversational solutions to ensure they meet evolving customer needs and industry standards.

   Subjects you might be working on include: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows, implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts, implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms, design how we store and manually annotate data etc.

   Most recently we are in a middle of a massive migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot while attempting to empower our solutions with LLMs in a manner that is responsible, secure and reliable within the standards of ABN AMRO.

   Working environment

   You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants.

   In the extended team (~50 colleagues) you will be working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Conversational AI, LLMs, Chatbots, Voicebots, and specifically mentions migrating to MS Copilot and empowering solutions with LLMs. It details tasks like implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts and classification algorithms, and designing data storage for annotation, all of which align with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on building and deploying generative AI applications. While data engineering tasks are mentioned, they are in service of the conversational AI and LLM initiatives.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'automating the data and ml processes' and 'Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows' directly relate to building and maintaining data pipelines and infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: automating the data and ml processes

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows' describes the design and implementation of data infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts' involves assessing and refining the output of generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms' refers to the process of assessing machine learning models.
job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'empower our solutions with LLMs' indicates the core task of leveraging large language models.
The mention of 'Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist' implies building and maintaining user-facing conversational AI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist

job_tasks.justification: The migration to 'MS Copilot' suggests integrating and developing within a broader AI-powered software ecosystem.
job_tasks.phrase: migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows by automating the data and ml processes' points to the operational aspects of keeping AI systems running.
job_tasks.phrase: maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows by automating the data and ml processes

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'design how we store and manually annotate data' relates to the infrastructure and processes needed for model development and maintenance.
job_tasks.phrase: design how we store and manually annotate data
